QuestData.Title: The Village of Glenbrook
QuestData.Description: <The book is a register of the inhabitants of Glenbrook.$b$bAll but a few of the names are crossed out.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Discover the fate of the Glenbrook villagers.
QuestData.RewardText: <Annie looks at you, her eyes hollow and empty. Her clothes are stained with blood, though she seems to be mostly unscathed. She stutters, but her words are unintelligible.>
